channel.title: [317] silab source help please!
channel.description:
[u]What I need help with[/u] I want a new playerrights = 5 for donater, (sort of done...)
I want a new a login name for donater, Donater (playername) has logged in w00t!! (done) (what file would i find this in?)
I have already got the dragon claws model, how would I add the 4 hit spec to it? (NOT DONE)
Thanks guys,
Every help is appreciated, if you tell me to use google or search il rape you, i cant find nothing.
EDIT: how would i add a donater image next to there name? and make donaters can yell only? (NOT DONE)

Thanks for the reply anfernio, I completed that task, i still have others undone, please can you guys check them out please?

if(playerRights >= 5) yell(""+playerName+" has logged in... Yay... He's a donator. BJ plz."); }

item.title: [317] silab source help please!
item.dc:creator: @i_weed_i1 i weed i_
item.description:
@i_weed_i1 wrote:

go to client.java and search… has logged in
and after the last }, add else if (playerRights == 5) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Donater " + playerName + " has logged in! W00t!!"; }

Read full topic

item.title: [317] silab source help please!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Looks like Lester Knome has to save the day (dododooo!)

Ill tell you the server side, you can find the client side looking at bluurrs client and using some logical thinking:

(PS: make a int called:
public int donator = 0;
If you don’t already have one.)

Find something like:

if (playerRights == 3)

Above that add:

if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) 
out.write(4);

Now make your client have the donator sign for the int 4

Read full topic

item.title: [317] silab source help please!
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:11, topic:292915”][quote author=Natey link=topic=387035.msg2899500#msg2899500 date=1249426915]

Well take a look at what you posted and you’ll see.
[/quote]" +playerName+ ", I just love the spaces.

No, that would still work. It’s the fact he made 5 switch statements switching the same value.[/quote]Oh, lol.
I’ve tried that before and it never worked for me O.o, hmm since he’s on a fail silab server.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] silab source help please!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:6, topic:292915”][quote author=Buddy_budster link=topic=387035.msg2899227#msg2899227 date=1249415500]
you could always do the the other methode look for

public void initialize() {

when you have found that put this below it

switch(playerRights) { case 5: yell("Donator-" +playerName+ " has logged in! W00t!!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 3: yell("Owner OR Co-Owner-" +playerName+ " has logged in!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 2: yell("Adiministrator-"+playerName+" has logged in!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 1: yell("Moderator-"+playerName+" has logged in!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 0: yell("Player-"+playerName+" has logged in!"); }

thant makes it so when he logggs in it give the message Donator (playername) has logged in WOOT!

anyway hope it helps,
Buddy
[/quote]
You sir are a fucking idiot.[/quote]

I loled @that

Read full topic

item.title: [317] silab source help please!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In the ‘initialize’ method in client.java, add:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName +"has logged in w00t!!"; }

Read full topic
